263056.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ \n 第８回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストに:
Ladies and gentlemen!I'd like to introduce the
handsome men who will be participating in the
8th Astoltia Knight Contest!

263057.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ \n 見事 出場権を獲得した ４名に加えて～……:
In addition to the four who performed well in
the previous round and qualified for the
competition

263058.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 １名と！\n 総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた ３名:
One special recommendation by Falpapa God, and three winners who won the 48 qualifying rounds! and 3 winners from the total of 48
qualifiers!In total, 8 handsome men will battle it out!

263059.「……コイツが ナイトになる日が来るとは\n 誰が想像しただろう！？ 並みいるイ:
Who would have thought he would one day become Knight? A miraculous middle-aged man who pushed aside all the other good-looking men
and rose to the top!

263060.「ガラクタひと筋 ウン十年！\n 今日も わが道 突っ走れ～ッ！\n ガラクタ城:
I've been a junk lover for over 10 years!
Today, too, I'm going my own way~! The
eccentric of Junk Castle! Lord Duston!

263061.「わしが 選ばれたってことは\n ナイトってのは 世界一の\n 役立たずに 与え:
If I was chosen, it means that Knight is a
title given to the most useless person in the
world!

263062.「ぐぎゃぎゃぎゃッ！ いいでしょう！\n ポンコツの中の ポンコツを決める 戦い:
Giggle, giggle, giggle! All right! This is a
battle to decide who is the junkest of the
junks! I'm going to win it again and again!

263064.「お おぉ……めずらしく やる気満々だじぇ。\n なーんか 調子くるっちゃうけど:
Oh, you seem unusually full of enthusiasm. I'm
getting a bit sloppy, but I'll get my head
back on straight and try again next time~~!

263065.「ナイト コンテスト ３連覇の経歴を持つ\n 伝説の男の お出ましだ～！ あなた:
Here comes the legendary man who has won the Knight Contest three times in a row! He's a killer looking guy who's going to make your
heart skip a beat!

263066.「クールに見えて じつは 意外と負けず嫌い？\n リベンジの炎が メラメラ 燃え:
You may look cool, but you actually hate to lose, don't you? The flame of revenge is burning in FrizzFrizz~! The lone swordsman who
appears and disappears from the face of the earth! Hyuza!

263067.「敗北を知るっていうのも 悪くないもんだな。\n あの経験は オレを 強くしてく:
Knowing defeat is also a bad kunai. That
experience made me stronger. I don't feel like
losing to anyone anymore.

263068.「どんな強敵が 立ちふさがろうと 関係ねぇ。\n 勝つのは……オレだぜ？:
I don't care who's standing in my way. I'm the
one who wins, okay?

263069.「続いても コンテスト常連の この人～！\n ゴーグルの奥の ミステリアスな瞳に:
Next up is another contest regular, this one!
Behind those goggles, he is a man with passion
like the sun in his mysterious eyes!

263070.「彼が 探し求めるは 輝く財宝か\n ナイトの座か それとも……？\n 博識なる:
Is it a shining treasure he seeks, or a place
in the Knight's throne? The learned inquirer!
Raul!

263071.「俺が求める 財宝は\n 夜空に浮かぶ 月のように 美しく……\n そして 遠い:
The treasure I seek is as beautiful and
distant as the moon in the night sky.

263072.「だが 決して あきらめるわけには いかない。\n 再び あの光を 手にするため:
But I cannot give up. Will you lend me your
power to make that light shine again?

263073.「こんな カッコイイお父さんが ほしかったッ！\n 古代エテーネ王国から やって:
I always wanted a father like him! The
mysterious Dark Swordsman from the ancient
Ethene Kingdom!

263074.「愛する妻子に ナイトの栄光を 持ち帰るため\n 心優しき父親は 時を超えた戦い:
To bring back the glory of Knight to his beloved wife and child, a kind-hearted father challenges a battle that transcends time! The
supreme time-traveling wielder! Padre!

263075.「たとえ 底知れぬ 暗闇の中に あろうとも\n 迷いはしない。他ならぬ お前の声:
Even if I am in the bottomless darkness, I
will not get lost. Because your voice will
guide me.

263076.「今こそ その声に 応えよう。\n 愛する者たちのため\n この戦い 必ず 勝利:
Now is the time to answer that call. For the
sake of those I love, I will surely win this
battle!

263077.「続いて ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特別推薦枠 １名を ご紹介だよぉーっ！:
Next, Falpapa will introduce one special
recommendation!

263078.「魔界に 迷いこんだ 人間の青年！\n はかなげで 神秘的な たたずまいは\n:
A human young man who wandered into Demon World! His fragile and mysterious appearance reminds you of someone from somewhere, doesn't
it?

263079.「名前以外 一切不明！\n 謎だらけの ミステリアスボーイ！\n ナラジア！:
He is completely unknown except for his name!
Mysterious boy full of mystery! Narasia!

263082.「ここからは 激しい予選を勝ち抜いた\n 強豪が 続々 登場～！\n トップバッ:
From here on, the strong competitors who won in the fierce qualifying rounds will appear one after another! The top batter is~~~ this
guy!

263083.「じゃじゃーん！\n 第８回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n 結果発表:
Ta-da! We are going to start announcing the
results of the 8th Astoltia Knight Contest!

263084.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come on, come on, come on! Who will be the
Knight of White Chocolate Castle? Listen
carefully with your ears plugged~!

263085.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！:
Let's go! Everyone, pay attention to the
stage!

263839.「どうして 僕は ここにいるんだろう……。\n 何も 思いだせない……。: Why am I here? I can't remember anything.

263840.「いきなり 知らない場所に来て 不安だけど……\n こんな僕にも できることがあ:
I'm worried about coming to a strange place
out of the blue, but if there's anything I can
do, I'd like to do my best for everyone.

263841.「イケメン畑に咲いた 一輪のキュートな花……。\n 皆様 お待ちかねの ふわモコ:
A single cute flower bloomed in the field of
handsome men. The long-awaited Prince Fuwamoco
has returned to White Chocolate Castle!

263842.「いつも 必死にがんばる ラブリーな姿に\n 周りの誰もが メロメロだとか！？\:
He is always trying his best to be the best he can be, and his lovely appearance is making everyone around him fall in love with him! The
heir to Megistris~! Prince Raguas!

263843.「メ…メリルさん！ ラブリーとかキュートとか\n あまり 言い過ぎないでください:
Me-merrill! Please don't say "lovely" or
"cute" too much. I have pride too.

263844.「小さくても 非力でも……\n かっこよくて 頼れるナイトになれること\n この:
I will prove here that I can be a cool and
dependable Knight even if I am small and
powerless!

263845.「主君のためなら エンヤコラ！\n 野を越え 山を越え 時をも超えちゃう\n キ:
For the sake of my lord, I'll do anything! The
king of loyalty that transcends fields,
mountains, and time!

263846.「エテーネ王国一と うたわれた\n 剣技と漢気で ライバルたちを一蹴だっ！\n:
Utaed as the best in the Ethene Kingdom, I kicked out all my rivals with my swordsmanship and chivalry! Faras is a swordsman with a true
heart and soul!

263847.「なんと！ また 我が主と\n 同じ舞台に 立つことになろうとは……！\n これ:
What a surprise! I never thought I would be
standing on the same stage with my Lord again!
Is this a twist of fate?

263848.「かくなる上は いっさいの緩みは\n 許されませんな！ このファラス\n 全力を:
Since this is the case, there can be no
slackness at all! I will give this Faras my
all!

263849.「ラストは 予選を\n ぶっっっちぎりのトップで 通過した\n このオトコが 華:
Lastly, this guy who came out of the
qualifying rounds as the best by a landslide
made a spectacular appearance!

263850.「ファラザードの魔王の おカタ～い副官殿！\n 自由奔放な主のおかげで 今日も頭:
The Demon King of Farazard, his stodgy second-
in-command! Thanks to the free-spirited Lord,
I have a headache today.

263851.「何かと お忙しいところを\n 無理言って 来てもらっちゃったじぇ～！\n 隻眼:
I had to force you to come when you were busy
with other things! Nazine, the hardworking man
with one eye~!

263852.「まさか 私ひとりで アストルティアに\n 来ることになろうとは……。\n これ:
I never thought I would come to Astoltia by
myself. Yushka is going to be very upset
later.

263853.「だが あいつが話していた コンテストに\n 多少 興味があったのも事実だ。そし:
But it's also true that I was somewhat interested in the contest he was talking about. And since I'm participating, I have no
intention of losing.

263854.「この戦い……\n 勝機をつかむには 君たちの協力が 不可欠だ。\n どうか 私:
In order for us to have a chance to win this
battle, your cooperation is indispensable. I
ask for your help.

263855.「以上っ！ ８名の \n イケメンと そうじゃないのが\n ナイトの座をかけ コ:
That's all! 8 good looking guys and 8 not-so-
good looking guys will be competing for the
title of Knight!

263856.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory? It's you who
will be here~!

263857.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n:
Well, what do you think? How's it going? .There's a big group of very handsome men here, but honestly, who's my
favorite~?

263858.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n イケメンを選んだら\n キミ:
When you have chosen a handsome man who you
think is worthy of being Astoltia Knight, cast
your vote!

263859.「そうそう。今回 投票するのは\n 私の カワイイ妹っ！\n 集計係モカの所だか:
Oh, yeah. This time, I'm voting for my little
sister! Tallier Mocha's place, so be careful!

263860.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら\n 話すことがあるから メリルの所に 来るべし！\:
When you're done voting for Knight, you should come by Merrill's place because we have something to talk about! I'll be waiting
outside, I promise~!
